pull.title: rpc: Use pushKV in some new PSBT RPCs
pull.body: Most of the code uses `UniValue::pushKV` where appropriate, but some new RPC code related to PSBTs did not.  This fixes those places - after this change, there are no remaining source files I could find that contain `push_back(Pair(`.

events.message:
Use pushKV in some new PSBT RPCs.

Most of the code uses UniValue::pushKV where appropriate, but some new
RPC code related to PSBTs did not.

rename.from: trivial: Use pushKV in some new PSBT RPCs
rename.to: rpc: Use pushKV in some new PSBT RPCs

events.body:
utACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13927/commits/227d27e70c1b41ee88885d72bcf48448aa5a57a9

I see no more instances of old style
Reviewers for this, please review https://github.com/bitcoin-core/univalue/pull/11 so `push_back(Pair())` doesn't get reintroduced to the codebase again.
